Safe Harbor Marathon offers a quintessential Florida Keys experience with exceptional amenities and convenient access from the ocean or gulf. Lose yourself in spectacular views while enjoying the resort style pool after a full day of fishing, kite-boarding or cruising surrounding waters.

Stay waterside at our premier waterfront RV sites, with breathtaking views and convenient access to the onsite pool and restaurant. Please contact our marina office for details.
Safe Harbor Marathon

What People Are Saying
5.0
|
155 Reviews
This is the best Marina I have ever been with!!! The staff is soooo wonderful and caring they work sooo hard to make our experience the best ever. Even though all the upgrades and construction this Ma...
Show More
This is the best Marina I have ever been with!!! The staff is soooo wonderful and caring they work sooo hard to make our experience the best ever. Even though all the upgrades and construction this Marina is the one I want to stay at till the Lord comes and gets us!!!!! The saltwater pool is the best ever the gym is small but mighty the  grilling area is big enough to have the the best birthday party ever and  there are always cool things the Marina has for the residents ohhh yea and there are plenty of washers and dryers in a brand new laundry room!!! Xoxox
Show Less
Chanda
1 year ago
We just spent a month in the boatyard grinding, sanding, painting, thru hulls, etc. and Dottie and her Crew are wonderful. Everyone is attentive, knowledgeable, patient, hardworking with a smile and w...
Show More
We just spent a month in the boatyard grinding, sanding, painting, thru hulls, etc. and Dottie and her Crew are wonderful. Everyone is attentive, knowledgeable, patient, hardworking with a smile and we are happy to recommend them. Kudos to Safe Harbor Marathon!
Show Less
Janell Lawrence
1 year ago
I have experience with Safe Harbor, and this place is off the hook. The staff is extremely attentive and helpful. The facilities were clean and well maintained.  The pool was outstanding with lots of ...
Show More
I have experience with Safe Harbor, and this place is off the hook. The staff is extremely attentive and helpful. The facilities were clean and well maintained.  The pool was outstanding with lots of high-class furniture. Tikis and gathering areas throughout. This location also had a travel lift to address any problems as a boater. A+++. Thank you for a perfect stay. I will visit again.
Show Less
David Steeves
1 year ago
Spent 10 days at Safe Harbor Marathon in May of 2024. Beautiful Marina, very clean and very helpful folks who work there. Can’t wait to come back. Thank you to the team there !
Tim Wedemyer
1 year ago
This is my go to Fuel stop in the Keys. Friendly helpful staff and up to date facilities.
Andrew Jagger
1 year ago
Enrique Mora

We use cookies to personalize content and to provide you with an improved user experience. By continuing to browse this site you consent to the use of cookies. Please visit our privacy policy for further details.
I understand
Privacy & Cookies Policy
Close
Privacy Overview
This website uses cookies to improve your experience while you navigate through the website. Out of these cookies, the cookies that are categorized as necessary are stored on your browser as they are essential for the working of basic functionalities of the website. We also use third-party cookies that help us analyze and understand how you use this website. These cookies will be stored in your browser only with your consent. You also have the option to opt-out of these cookies. But opting out of some of these cookies may have an effect on your browsing experience.
Necessary
Necessary
Always Enabled
Necessary cookies are absolutely essential for the website to function properly. This category only includes cookies that ensures basic functionalities and security features of the website. These cookies do not store any personal information.
Non-necessary
Non-necessary
Any cookies that may not be particularly necessary for the website to function and is used specifically to collect user personal data via analytics, ads, other embedded contents are termed as non-necessary cookies. It is mandatory to procure user consent prior to running these cookies on your website.
SAVE & ACCEPT
googleon: all
